about_the_game:
The Age of Magic Has Come:

The arena transforms as magic enters the fray in the Age of Magic. Join the Wild Mage Association in their quest to bring magic to the Freelands, introducing new spells, challenges, and a fresh layer of strategy to gladiatorial combat. There’s also two hours of new storylines—including two well-designed levels that will test your skills and immerse you further in the arena’s evolving world.

Key Features:

Master Six Types of Magic

Wield over 60 spells across six unique schools of magic, each offering distinct abilities and tactics that bring a new depth to the arena. Experiment with a mix of elemental attacks, defensive spells, and strategic powers to redefine your combat style.

  • Flame: Unleash intense fire magic to burn and devastate your opponents.

  • Ice: Slow enemies with frost, hindering movement and setting up powerful strikes.

  • Lightning: Command lightning to shock foes, empower allies, or strike groups at once.

  • Air: Manipulate the atmosphere to trap enemies and disrupt their attacks.

  • Light: Use light magic to shield allies, boost resistance, or deal radiant damage.

  • Darkness: Inflict curses that weaken foes, corrupting them and sapping their strength.

New Storyline

Follow Adelina, leader of the Wild Mage Association, as she brings magic to the Freelands. This journey introduces a fresh narrative, adding a new dimension to the world of gladiators and the conflicts within it.

Magic-Themed Arena

Enter a newly crafted battleground where magic powers every clash. Designed to showcase spellcasting, this arena provides a visually striking setting for magical combat.

A Vast Array of Mage Weapons and Equipment
Equip your gladiators with powerful magical weapons and equipment, including Legendary Sets with unique effects that bring new strategic options to each battle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 (3.1 GHz) / AMD FX-6300 X6 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 (3.5 GHz)/AMD FX-8300 (3.3 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: The Age of Magic has come to the Freelands! Help Adelina, the leader of the Wild Mage Association, fulfill her ambition to introduce magic into the gladiatorial tournaments. Exciting new content and gameplay mechanics!
